name: Shibboleth Esignature
description: A module for enabling esignature on servers using shibboleth authentication

system-settings.name:
This module requires server configuration changes when initially configured to work.
It should be enabled for all projects (top checkbox) if you use Shibboleth.
See the README for details.

E-signature Shibboleth Endpoint
This entry should be a relative URL on your REDCap server
It should be outside of your REDCap version folders.
e.g. /esig/sign.php
